scene definitions : This is the logic between different menus of the applications. These scenes permit to bind their corresponding view (cf. VIEW, in particular usb CAN view) to MODEL component. More...

Detailed Description

scene definitions : This is the logic between different menus of the applications. These scenes permit to bind their corresponding view (cf. VIEW, in particular usb CAN view) to MODEL component.

Definition in file usbCan_scene.cpp.

Macro Definition Documentation

◆ ADD_SCENE [1/3]

#define ADD_SCENE (   prefix,
  name,
  id 
)    prefix##_scene_##name##_on_enter,

Generate scene on_enter handlers array to be passed SceneManagerHandlers::on_enter_handlers. It fills this array with function names generated in usbCan_scene.hpp.

Generate scene on_event handlers array to be passed SceneManagerHandlers::on_event_handlers. It fills this array with function names generated in usbCan_scene.hpp.

Generate scene on_exit handlers array to be passed SceneManagerHandlers::on_exit_handlers. It fills this array with function names generated in usbCan_scene.hpp.
